resources.string: This is a simple activity. Click on the search key to invoke the local search. \n\n The suggestion provider will also participate in the global search. when you come to this application through the global search you will not see this view but instead be directly taken to the searchactivity view.

If you are seeing this activity you are directed here either through the global search or through the local search. \n\n This activit also enables type-to-search. It also demonstrates the singletop/new intent concepts.
